mapper.sql: Article_ID, Article_FileName, Article_Path, Article_Data, Article_Title, Article_Introduce, Article_Type, Article_Picture_ID, Article_Resource_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from article
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into article

Article_FileName,
Article_Path,
Article_Data,
Article_Title,
Article_Introduce,

Article_Picture_ID,
